words.translation: All Praise|(is) for Allah|the One Who|(has) revealed|to|His slave|the Book|and not|(has) made|in it|any crookedness

translations.1: Alhamdu lillaahil lazeee anzala 'alaa 'abdihil kitaaba Wa-lam yaj'al lahoo 'iwajaa
translations.2: Alhamdu lillahi allathee anzala AAala AAabdihi alkitaba walam yajAAal lahu AAiwajan

words.translation: Straight|to warn|(of) a punishment|severe|from|near Him|and give glad tidings|(to) the believers|those who|do|righteous deeds|that|for them|(is) a good reward|(is) a good reward

translations.1: Qaiyimal liyunzira ba'asan shadeedam mil ladunhu Wa-yubashshiral mu'mineenal lazeena ya'maloonas saalihaati anna lahum ajran hasanaa
translations.2: Qayyiman liyunthira basan shadeedan min ladunhu wayubashshira almumineena allatheena yaAAmaloona alssalihati anna lahum ajran hasanan

words.translation: (They will) abide|in it|forever

translations.1: Maakiseena feehi abadaa
translations.2: Makitheena feehi abadan

words.translation: And to warn|those who|say|Allah has taken|Allah has taken|a son

translations.1: Wa-yunziral lazeena qaalut takhazal laahu waladaa
translations.2: Wayunthira allatheena qaloo ittakhatha Allahu waladan

words.translation: Not|they have|about it|any|knowledge|and not|their forefathers|Mighty (is)|the word|(that) comes out|of|their mouths|Not|they say|except|a lie

translations.1: Maa lahum bihee min 'ilminw Wa-laa li-aabaaa'ihim; kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwaahihim; iny yaqooloona illaa kazibaa
translations.2: Ma lahum bihi min AAilmin wala liabaihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim in yaqooloona illa kathiban

words.translation: Then perhaps you would (be)|the one who kills|yourself|over|their footsteps|if|not|they believe|in this|[the] narration|(in) grief

translations.1: Fala'allaka baakhi'un nafsaka 'alaaa aasaarihim il lam yu'minoo bihaazal hadeesi asafaa
translations.2: FalaAAallaka bakhiAAun nafsaka AAala atharihim in lam yuminoo bihatha alhadeethi asafan

words.translation: Indeed We|We have made|what|(is) on|the earth|adornment|for it|that We may test [them]|which of them|(is) best|(in) deed

translations.1: Innaa ja'alnaa ma 'alal ardi zeenatal lahaa linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu 'amalaa
translations.2: Inna jaAAalna ma AAala alardi zeenatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu AAamalan

words.translation: And indeed We|(will) surely make|what|(is) on it|soil|barren

translations.1: Wa-innaa la-jaa'iloona maa 'alaihaa sa'eedan juruzaa
translations.2: Wainna lajaAAiloona ma AAalayha saAAeedan juruzan

words.translation: Or|you think|that|(the) companions|(of) the cave|and the inscription|were|among|Our Signs|a wonder

translations.1: Am hasibta anna Ashaabal Kahfi war-Raqeemi kaanoo min Aayaatinaa 'ajabaa
translations.2: Am hasibta anna ashaba alkahfi waalrraqeemi kanoo min ayatina AAajaban

words.translation: When|retreated|the youths|to|the cave|and they said|Our Lord!|Grant us|from|Yourself|Mercy|and facilitate|for us|[from]|our affair|(in the) right way

translations.1: Iz awal fityatu ilal Kahfi faqaaloo Rabbanaaa aatinaa mil ladunka rahmatanw Wa-haiyi' lanaa min amrinaa rashadaa
translations.2: Ith awa alfityatu ila alkahfi faqaloo rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wahayyi lana min amrina rashadan

words.translation: So We cast|over|their ears|in|the cave|years|a number

translations.1: Fadarabnaa 'alaaa aazaanihim fil Kahfi seneena 'adadaa
translations.2: Fadarabna AAala athanihim fee alkahfi sineena AAadadan

words.translation: Then|We raised them up|that We make evident|which|(of) the two parties|best calculated|for what|(they had) remained|(in) time

translations.1: Summa ba'asnaahum lina'lama ayyul hizbaini ahsaa limaa labisooo amadaa
translations.2: Thumma baAAathnahum linaAAlama ayyu alhizbayni ahsa lima labithoo amadan

words.translation: We|narrate|to you|their story|in truth|Indeed they (were)|youths|who believed|in their Lord|and We increased them|(in) guidance

translations.1: Nahnu naqussu 'alaika naba-ahum bilhaqq; innahum fityatun aamanoo bi-Rabbihim Wa-zidnaahum hudaa
translations.2: Nahnu naqussu AAalayka nabaahum bialhaqqi innahum fityatun amanoo birabbihim wazidnahum hudan

words.translation: And We made firm|[on]|their hearts|when|they stood up|and said|Our Lord|(is) the Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|Never|we will invoke|besides Him|besides Him|any god|Certainly|we would have said|then|an enormity

translations.1: Wa-rabatnaa 'alaa quloo-bihim iz qaamoo faqaaloo Rabbunaa Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dooniheee ilaahal laqad qulnaaa izan shatataa
translations.2: Warabatna AAala quloobihim ith qamoo faqaloo rabbuna rabbu alssamawati waalardi lan nadAAuwa min doonihi ilahan laqad qulna ithan shatatan

words.translation: These|our people|have taken|besides Him|besides Him|gods|Why not|they come|to them|with an authority|clear|And who|(is) more wrong|than (one) who|invents|against|Allah|a lie

translations.1: Haaa'ulaaa'i qawmunat takhazoo min dooniheee aalihatal law laa yaatoona 'alaihim bisultaanim baiyin; faman azlamu mimmaniftaraa 'alal laahi kazibaa
translations.2: Haolai qawmuna ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatan lawla yatoona AAalayhim bisultanin bayyinin faman athlamu mimmani iftara AAala Allahi kathiban

words.translation: And when|you withdraw from them|and what|they worship|except|Allah|then retreat|to|the cave|Will spread|for you|your Lord|of|His Mercy|and will facilitate|for you|[from]|your affair|(in) ease

translations.1: Wa-izi'tazal tumoohum Wa-maa ya'budoona illal laaha faawooo ilal kahfi yanshur lakum Rabbukum mir rahmatihee Wa-yuhaiyi' lakum min amrikum mirfaqa
translations.2: Waithi iAAtazaltumoohum wama yaAAbudoona illa Allaha fawoo ila alkahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mirfaqan

words.translation: And you (might) have seen|the sun|when|it rose|inclining away|from|their cave|to|the right|and when|it set|passing away from them|to|the left|while they|(lay) in|the open space|thereof|That|(was) from|(the) Signs|(of) Allah|Whoever|Allah guides|Allah guides|and he|(is) the guided one|and whoever|He lets go astray|then never|you will find|for him|a protector|a guide

translations.1: Wa-tarash shamsa izaa tala'at tazaawaru 'an kahfihim zaatal yameeni Wa-izaa gharabat taqriduhum zaatash shimaali Wa-hum fee fajwatim minh; zaalika min Aayaatil laah; maien yahdil laahu fahuwal muhtad, Wa-maien yudlil falan tajida lahoo waliyyam murshidaa
translations.2: Watara alshshamsa itha talaAAat tazawaru AAan kahfihim thata alyameeni waitha gharabat taqriduhum thata alshshimali wahum fee fajwatin minhu thalika min ayati Allahi man yahdi Allahu fahuwa almuhtadi waman yudlil falan tajida lahu waliyyan murshidan

words.translation: And you (would) think them|awake|while they|(were) asleep|And We turned them|to|the right|and to|the left|while their dog|stretched|his two forelegs|at the entrance|If|you had looked|at them|you (would) have surely turned back|from them|(in) flight|and surely you would have been filled|by them|(with) terror

translations.1: Wa-tahsabuhum ayqaazanw Wa-hum ruqood; Wa-nuqallibuhum zaatal yameeni Wa-zaatash shimaali Wa-kalbuhum baasitun ziraa'ayhi bilwaseed; lawit tala'ta 'alaihim la-wallaita minhum firaaranw Wa-lamuli'ta minhum rubaa
translations.2: Watahsabuhum ayqathan wahum ruqoodun wanuqallibuhum thata alyameeni wathata alshshimali wakalbuhum basitun thiraAAayhi bialwaseedi lawi ittalaAAta AAalayhim lawallayta minhum firaran walamulita minhum ruAAban

words.translation: And similarly|We raised them|that they might question|among them|Said|a speaker|among them|How long|have you remained|They said|We have remained|a day|or|a part|(of) a day|They said|Your Lord|knows best|how long|you have remained|So send|one of you|(with this) silver coin of yours|with this (silver coin of yours)|to|the city|and let him see|which is|the purest|food|and let him bring to you|provision|from it|and let him be cautious|And let not|be aware|about you|anyone

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika ba'asnaahum liyatasaaa'aloo bainahum; qaala qaaa'ilum minhum kam labistum qaaloo labisnaa yawman aw ba'da yawm; qaaloo Rabbukum a'lamu bimaa labistum fab'asooo ahadakum biwariqikum haazihee ilal madeenati falyanzur ayyuhaaa azkaa ta'aaman falyaatikum birizqim minhu walyatalattaf Wa-laa yush'iranna bikum ahadaa
translations.2: Wakathalika baAAathnahum liyatasaaloo baynahum qala qailun minhum kam labithtum qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAda yawmin qaloo rabbukum aAAlamu bima labithtum faibAAathoo ahadakum biwariqikum hathihi ila almadeenati falyanthur ayyuha azka taAAaman falyatikum birizqin minhu walyatalattaf wala yushAAiranna bikum ahadan

words.translation: Indeed [they]|if|they come to know|about you|they will stone you|or|return you|to|their religion|And never|will you succeed|then|ever

translations.1: Innahum ien yazharoo 'alaikum yarjumookum aw yu'eedookum fee millatihim Wa-lan tuflihooo izan abadaa
translations.2: Innahum in yathharoo AAalaykum yarjumookum aw yuAAeedookum fee millatihim walan tuflihoo ithan abadan

words.translation: And similarly|We made known|about them|that they might know|that|(the) Promise|(of) Allah|(is) true|and that|(about) the Hour|(there is) no|doubt|in it|When|they disputed|among themselves|about their affair|and they said|Construct|over them|a structure|Their Lord|knows best|about them|Said|those who|prevailed|in|their matter|Surely we will take|over them|a place of worship

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika a'sarnaa 'alaihim liya'lamooo anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-annas Saa'ata laa raiba feehaa iz yatanaaza'oona bainahum amrahum faqaalub noo 'alaihim bunyaanaa; Rabbuhum a'lamu bihim; qaalal lazeena ghalaboo 'alaaa amrihim lanat-takhizanna 'alaihim masjidaa
translations.2: Wakathalika aAAtharna AAalayhim liyaAAlamoo anna waAAda Allahi haqqun waanna alsaAAata la rayba feeha ith yatanazaAAoona baynahum amrahum faqaloo ibnoo AAalayhim bunyanan rabbuhum aAAlamu bihim qala allatheena ghalaboo AAala amrihim lanattakhithanna AAalayhim masjidan

words.translation: They say|(they were) three|the forth of them|their dog|and they say|(they were) five|the sixth of them|their dog|guessing|about the unseen|and they say|(they were) seven|and the eight of them|their dog|Say|My Lord|knows best|their number|None|knows them|except|a few|So (do) not|argue|about them|except|(with) an argument|obvious|and (do) not|inquire|about them|among them|(from) anyone

translations.1: Sa-yaqooloona salaasatur raabi'uhum kalbuhum Wa-yaqooloona khamsatun saadisuhum kalbuhum rajmam bilghaib; Wa-yaqooloona sab'atunw Wa-saaminuhum kalbuhum; qur Rabbeee a'lamu bi'iddatihim maa ya'lamuhum illaa qaleel; falaa tumaari feehim illaa miraaa'an zaahiranw Wa-laa tastafti feehim minhum ahadaa
translations.2: Sayaqooloona thalathatun rabiAAuhum kalbuhum wayaqooloona khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bialghaybi wayaqooloona sabAAatun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbee aAAlamu biAAiddatihim ma yaAAlamuhum illa qaleelun fala tumari feehim illa miraan thahiran wala tastafti feehim minhum ahadan

words.translation: And (do) not|say|of anything|Indeed I|will do|that|tomorrow

translations.1: Wa-laa taqoolanna lishai'in innee faa'ilun zaalika ghadaa
translations.2: Wala taqoolanna lishayin innee faAAilun thalika ghadan

words.translation: Except|If|Allah wills|Allah wills|And remember|your Lord|when|you forget|and say|Perhaps|[that]|will guide me|my Lord|to a nearer (way)|than|this|right way

translations.1: Illaaa aien yashaaa'al laah; wazkur Rabbaka izaa naseeta Wa-qul 'asaaa any yahdiyani Rabbee li-aqraba min haazaa rashadaa
translations.2: Illa an yashaa Allahu waothkur rabbaka itha naseeta waqul AAasa an yahdiyani rabbee liaqraba min hatha rashadan

words.translation: And they remained|in|their cave|(for) three|hundred|years|and add|nine

translations.1: Wa-labisoo fee kahfihim salaasa mi'atin sineena wazdaadoo tis'aa
translations.2: Walabithoo fee kahfihim thalatha miatin sineena waizdadoo tisAAan

words.translation: Say|Allah|knows best|about what (period)|they remained|For Him|(is the) unseen|(of) the heavens|and the earth|How clearly He sees|[of it]|And how clearly He hears|Not|for them|besides Him|besides Him|any|protector|and not|He shares|[in]|His Commands|(with) anyone

translations.1: Qulil laahu a'lamu bimaa labisoo lahoo ghaibus samaawaati wal-ardi absir bihee Wa-asmi'; maa lahum min doonihee minw waliyyinw Wa-laa yushriku fee hukmihee ahadaa
translations.2: Quli Allahu aAAlamu bima labithoo lahu ghaybu alssamawati waalardi absir bihi waasmiAA ma lahum min doonihi min waliyyin wala yushriku fee hukmihi ahadan

words.translation: And recite|what|has been revealed|to you|of|the Book|(of) your Lord|None|can change|His Words|and never|you will find|besides Him|besides Him|a refuge

translations.1: Watlu maaa oohiya ilaika min Kitaabi Rabbika laa mubaddila li-Kalimaatihee Wa-lan tajida min doonihee multahadaa
translations.2: Waotlu ma oohiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min doonihi multahadan

words.translation: And be patient|yourself|with|those who|call|their Lord|in the morning|and the evening|desiring|His Face|And (let) not|pass beyond|your eyes|over them|desiring|adornment|(of) the life|(of) the world|and (do) not|obey|whom|We Have Made Heedless|his heart|of|Our rememberance|and follows|his desires|and is|his affair|(in) excess

translations.1: Wasbir nafsaka ma'al lazeena yad'oona Rabbahum bilghadaati wal'ashiyyi yureedoona Wajhahoo Wa-laa ta'du 'aynaaka 'anhum tureedu zeenatal hayaatid dunyaa Wa-laa tuti' man aghfalnaa qalbahoo 'an zikrinaa wattaba'a hawaahu Wa-kaana amruhoo furutaa
translations.2: Waisbir nafsaka maAAa allatheena yadAAoona rabbahum bialghadati waalAAashiyyi yureedoona wajhahu wala taAAdu AAaynaka AAanhum tureedu zeenata alhayati alddunya wala tutiAA man aghfalna qalbahu AAan thikrina waittabaAAa hawahu wakana amruhu furutan

words.translation: And say|The truth|(is) from|your Lord|so whoever|wills|let him believe|and whoever|wills|let him disbelieve|Indeed We|have prepared|for the wrongdoers|a Fire|will surround|them|its walls|And if|they call for relief|they will be relieved|with water|like molten brass|(which) scalds|the faces|Wretched|(is) the drink|and evil|(is) the resting place

translations.1: Wa-qulil haqqu mir Rabbikum faman shaaa'a falyu'minw Wa-man shaaa'a falyakfur; innaaa a'tadnaa lizzaalimeena Naaran ahaata bihim suraadiquhaa; Wa-ien yastagheesoo yughaasoo bimaaa'in kalmuhli yashwil wujooh' bi'sash sharaab; Wa-saaa'at murtafaqaa
translations.2: Waquli alhaqqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyumin waman shaa falyakfur inna aAAtadna lilththalimeena naran ahata bihim suradiquha wain yastagheethoo yughathoo bimain kaalmuhli yashwee alwujooha bisa alshsharabu wasaat murtafaqan

words.translation: Indeed|those who|believed|and did|the good deeds|indeed, We|will not let go waste|will not let go waste|(the) reward|(of one) who|does good|deeds

translations.1: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati innaa laa nudee'u ajra man ahsana 'amalaa
translations.2: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati inna la nudeeAAu ajra man ahsana AAamalan

words.translation: Those|for them|(are) Gardens|of Eden|flows|from|underneath them|the rivers|They will be adorned|therein|[of] (with)|bracelets|of|gold|and will wear|garments|green|of|fine silk|and heavy brocade|reclining|therein|on|adorned couches|Excellent|(is) the reward|and good|(is) the resting place

translations.1: Ulaaa'ika lahum Jannaatu 'Adnin tajree min tahtihimul anhaaru yuhallawna feehaa min asaawira min zahabinw Wa-yalbasoona siyaaban khudram min sundusinw Wa-istabraqim muttaki'eena feehaa 'alal araaa'ik; ni'mas sawaab; Wa-hasunat murtafaqaa
translations.2: Olaika lahum jannatu AAadnin tajree min tahtihimu alanharu yuhallawna feeha min asawira min thahabin wayalbasoona thiyaban khudran min sundusin waistabraqin muttakieena feeha AAala alaraiki niAAma alththawabu wahasunat murtafaqan

words.translation: And set forth|to them|the example|of two men:|We provided|for one of them|two gardens|of|grapes|and We bordered them|with date-palms|and We placed|between both of them|crops

translations.1: Wadrib lahum masalar rajulaini ja'alnaa li-ahadihimaa jannataini min a'naabinw Wa-hafafnaahumaa binakhilinw Wa-ja'alnaa bainahumaa zar'aa
translations.2: Waidrib lahum mathalan rajulayni jaAAalna liahadihima jannatayni min aAAnabin wahafafnahuma binakhlin wajaAAalna baynahuma zarAAan

words.translation: Each|(of) the two gardens|brought forth|its produce|and not|did wrong|of it|anything|And We caused to gush forth|within them|a river

translations.1: Kiltal jannataini aatat ukulahaa Wa-lam tazlim minhu shai'anw Wa-fajjarnaa khi-laalahumaa naharaa
translations.2: Kilta aljannatayni atat okulaha walam tathlim minhu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan

words.translation: And was|for him|fruit|so he said|to his companion|while he|(was) talking with him|I am|greater|than you|(in) wealth|and stronger|(in) men

translations.1: Wa-kaana lahoo samarun faqaala lisaahibihee Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhoo ana aksaru minka maalanw Wa-a'azzu nafaraa
translations.2: Wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihi wahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malan waaAAazzu nafaran

words.translation: And he entered|his garden|while he|(was) unjust|to himself|He said|Not|I think|that|will perish|this|ever

translations.1: Wa-dakhala jannatahoo Wa-huwa zaalimul linafsihee qaala maaa azunnu an tabeeda haaziheee abadaa
translations.2: Wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa thalimun linafsihi qala ma athunnu an tabeeda hathihi abadan

words.translation: And not|I think|the Hour|will occur|And if|I am brought back|to|my Lord|I will surely find|better|than this|(as) a return

translations.1: Wa-maaa azunnus Saa'ata qaaa'imatanw Wa-la'ir rudittu ilaa Rabbee la-ajidanna khairam minhaa munqalabaa
translations.2: Wama athunnu alssaAAata qaimatan walain rudidtu ila rabbee laajidanna khayran minha munqalaban

words.translation: Said|to him|his companion|while he|was talking to him|Do you disbelieve|in One Who|created you|from|dust|then|from|a minute quantity of semen|then|fashioned you|(into) a man

translations.1: Qaala lahoo saahibuhoo Wa-huwa yuhaawiruhooo akafarta billazee khalaqaka min turaabin summa min nutfatin summa sawwaaka rajulaa
translations.2: Qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhu akafarta biallathee khalaqaka min turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma sawwaka rajulan

words.translation: But as for me|He|(is) Allah|my Lord|and not|I associate|with my Lord|anyone

translations.1: Laakinaa Huwal laahu Rabbee Wa-laa ushriku bi-Rabbeee ahadaa
translations.2: Lakinna huwa Allahu rabbee wala oshriku birabbee ahadan

words.translation: And why (did you) not|when|you entered|your garden|say|What|wills|Allah|(there is) no|power|except|with Allah|If|you see|me|lesser|than you|(in) wealth|and children

translations.1: Wa-law-laaa iz dakhalta jannataka qulta maa shaaa'al laahu laa quwwata illaa billaah; in tarani ana aqalla minka maalanw Wa-waladaa
translations.2: Walawla ith dakhalta jannataka qulta ma shaa Allahu la quwwata illa biAllahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malan wawaladan

words.translation: It may be|that my Lord|that my Lord|will give me|better|than|your garden|and will send|upon it|a calamity|from|the sky|then it will become|ground|slippery

translations.1: Fa'asaa Rabeee aien yu'tiyani khairam min jannatika Wa-yursila 'alaihaa husbaanam minas samaaa'i fatusbiha sa'eedan zalaqaa
translations.2: FaAAasa rabbee an yutiyani khayran min jannatika wayursila AAalayha husbanan mina alssamai fatusbiha saAAeedan zalaqan

words.translation: Or|will become|its water|sunken|so never|you will be able|to find it|to find it

translations.1: Aw yusbiha maaa'uhaaa ghawran falan tastatee'a lahoo talabaa
translations.2: Aw yusbiha maoha ghawran falan tastateeAAa lahu talaban

words.translation: And were surrounded|his fruits|so he began|twisting|his hands|over|what|he (had) spent|on it|while it (had)|collapsed|on|its trellises|and he said|Oh! I wish|I had not associated|I had not associated|with my Lord|anyone

translations.1: Wa-uheeta bisamarihee faasbaha yuqallibu kaffaihi 'alaa maaa anfaqa feehaa Wa-hiya khaawiyatun 'alaa 'urooshihaa Wa-yaqoolu yaalaitanee lam ushrik bi-Rabbeee ahadaa
translations.2: Waoheeta bithamarihi faasbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi AAala ma anfaqa feeha wahiya khawiyatun AAala AAurooshiha wayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oshrik birabbee ahadan

words.translation: And not|was|for him|a group|(to) help him|other than|other than|Allah|and not|was|(he) supported

translations.1: Wa-lam takul lahoo fi'atuien yansuroonahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana muntasiraa
translations.2: Walam takun lahu fiatun yansuroonahu min dooni Allahi wama kana muntasiran

words.translation: There|the protection|(is) from Allah|the True|He|(is the) best|(to) reward|and (the) best|(for) the final end

translations.1: Hunaalikal walaayatu lillaahil haqq; huwa khairun sawaabanw Wa-khairun 'uqbaa
translations.2: Hunalika alwalayatu lillahi alhaqqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun AAuqban

words.translation: And present|to them|the example|(of) the life|(of) the world|like water|which We send down|from|the sky|then mingles|with it|(the) vegetation|(of) the earth|then becomes|dry stalks|it (is) scattered|(by) the winds|And Allah|And Allah|over|every|thing|(is) All Able

translations.1: Wadrib lahum masalal hayaatid dunyaa kamaaa'in anzalnaahu minas samaaa'i fakhtalata bihee nabaatul ardi fa-asbaha hasheeman tazroo-hur riyaah; Wa-kaanal laahu 'alaa kulli shai'im muqtadiraa
translations.2: Waidrib lahum mathala alhayati alddunya kamain anzalnahu mina alssamai faikhtalata bihi nabatu alardi faasbaha hasheeman tathroohu alrriyahu wakana Allahu AAala kulli shayin muqtadiran

words.translation: The wealth|and children|(are) adornment|(of) the life|(of) the world|But the enduring|good deeds|(are) better|near|your Lord|(for) reward|and better|(for) hope

translations.1: Almaalu walbanoona zeenatul hayaatid dunya wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairun amalaa
translations.2: Almalu waalbanoona zeenatu alhayati alddunya waalbaqiyatu alssalihatu khayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun amalan

words.translation: And the Day|We will cause (to) move|the mountains|and you will see|the earth|(as) a leveled plain|and We will gather them|and not|We will leave behind|from them|anyone

translations.1: Wa-yawma nusaiyirul jibaala Wa-taral arda baariza-tanw Wa-hasharnaahum falam nughaadir minhum ahadaa
translations.2: Wayawma nusayyiru aljibala watara alarda barizatan wahasharnahum falam nughadir minhum ahadan

words.translation: And they will be presented|before|your Lord|(in) rows|Certainly|you have come to Us|as|We created you|the first|time|Nay|you claimed|that not|We made|for you|an appointment

translations.1: Wa 'uridoo 'alaa Rabbika saffaa, laqad ji'tumoonaa kamaa khalaqnaakum awala marrah; bal za'amtum allannaj'ala lakum maw'idaa
translations.2: WaAAuridoo AAala rabbika saffan laqad jitumoona kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin bal zaAAamtum allan najAAala lakum mawAAidan

words.translation: And (will) be placed|the Book|and you will see|the criminals|fearful|of what|(is) in it|and they will say|Oh woe to us!|What (is) for|this|[the] Book|not|leaves|a small|and not|a great|except|has enumerated it|And they will find|what|they did|presented|And not|deals unjustly|your Lord|(with) anyone

translations.1: Wa-wudi'al kitaabu fataral mujrimeena mushfiqeena mimmaa feehi Wa-yaqooloona yaa-wailatanaa maa lihaazal kitaabi laa yughaadiru saghee-ratanw Wa-laa kabeeratan illaaa ahsaahaa; Wa-wajadoo maa 'amiloo haadiraa; Wa-laa yazlimu Rabbuka ahadaa
translations.2: WawudiAAa alkitabu fatara almujrimeena mushfiqeena mimma feehi wayaqooloona ya waylatana ma lihatha alkitabi la yughadiru sagheeratan wala kabeeratan illa ahsaha wawajadoo ma AAamiloo hadiran wala yathlimu rabbuka ahadan

words.translation: And when|We said|to the Angels|Prostrate|to Adam|so they prostrated|except|Iblis|(He) was|of|the jinn|and he rebelled|against|the Command|(of) his Lord|Will you then take him|and his offspring|(as) protectors|other than Me|other than Me|while they|(are) to you|enemies|Wretched|for the wrongdoers|(is) the exchange

translations.1: Wa-iz qulnaa lilma-laaa'ikatis judoo li-Aadama fasajadooo illaaa Ibleesa kaana minal jinni fafasaqa 'an amri Rabbih; afatattakhizoonahoo Wa-zurriyatahooo awliyaaa'a min doonee Wa-hum lakum 'aduww; bi'sa lizzaalimeena badalaa
translations.2: Waith qulna lilmalaikati osjudoo liadama fasajadoo illa ibleesa kana mina aljinni fafasaqa AAan amri rabbihi afatattakhithoonahu wathurriyyatahu awliyaa min doonee wahum lakum AAaduwwun bisa lilththalimeena badalan

words.translation: Not|I made them witness|the creation|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and not|the creation|(of) themselves|and not|I Am|the One to take|the misleaders|(as) helper(s)

translations.1: Maaa ash-hattuhum khalqas samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-laa khalqa anfusihim Wa-maa kuntu muttakhizal mudilleena 'adudaa
translations.2: Ma ashhadtuhum khalqa alssamawati waalardi wala khalqa anfusihim wama kuntu muttakhitha almudilleena AAadudan

words.translation: And the Day|He will say|Call|My partners|those who|you claimed|then they will call them|but not|they will respond|to them|And We will make|between them|a barrier

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yaqoolu naadoo shurakaaa'i yal-lazeena za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ja'alnaa bainahum maw-biqaa
translations.2: Wayawma yaqoolu nadoo shurakaiya allatheena zaAAamtum fadaAAawhum falam yastajeeboo lahum wajaAAalna baynahum mawbiqan

words.translation: And will see|the criminals|the Fire|and they (will be) certain|that they|are to fall in it|And not|they will find|from it|a way of escape

translations.1: Wa-ra al-mujrimoonan Naara fazannooo annahum muwaaqi'oohaa Wa-lam yajidoo 'anhaa masrifaa
translations.2: Waraa almujrimoona alnnara fathannoo annahum muwaqiAAooha walam yajidoo AAanha masrifan

words.translation: And certainly|We have explained|in|this|the Quran|for mankind|of|every|example|But is|the man|(in) most|things|quarrelsome

translations.1: Wa-laqad sarrafnaa fee haazal quraani linnaasi min kulli masal; Wa-kaanal insaanu aksara shai'in jadalaa
translations.2: Walaqad sarrafna fee hatha alqurani lilnnasi min kulli mathalin wakana alinsanu akthara shayin jadalan

words.translation: And nothing|prevents|men|that|they believe|when|has come to them|the guidance|and they ask forgiveness|(of) their Lord|except|that|comes to them|(the) way|(of) the former (people)|or|comes to them|the punishment|before (them)

translations.1: Wa-maa mana'an naasa any yu'minooo iz jaaa'ahumul hudaa Wa-yastaghfiroo Rabbahum illaaa an taatiyahum sunnatul awwaleena aw yaatiyahumul 'azaabu qubulaa
translations.2: Wama manaAAa alnnasa an yuminoo ith jaahumu alhuda wayastaghfiroo rabbahum illa an tatiyahum sunnatu alawwaleena aw yatiyahumu alAAathabu qubulan

words.translation: And not|We send|the Messengers|except|(as) bearers of glad tidings|and (as) warners|And dispute|those who|disbelieve|with falsehood|to refute|thereby|the truth|And they take|My Verses|and what|they are warned|(in) ridicule

translations.1: Wa-maa nursilul mursaleena illaa mubashshireena Wa-munzireen; Wa-yujaadilul lazeena kafaroo bilbaatili liyudhidoo bihil haqqa wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-maaa unziroo huzuwaa
translations.2: Wama nursilu almursaleena illa mubashshireena wamunthireena wayujadilu allatheena kafaroo bialbatili liyudhidoo bihi alhaqqa waittakhathoo ayatee wama onthiroo huzuwan

words.translation: And who|(is) more wrong|than (he) who|is reminded|of the Verses|(of) his Lord|but turns away|from them|and forgets|what|have sent forth|his hands|Indeed We|[We] have placed|over|their hearts|coverings|lest|they understand it|and in|their ears|(is) deafness|And if|you call them|to|the guidance|then never|they will be guided|then|ever

translations.1: Wa-man azlamu mimman zukkira bi-ayaati Rabbihee fa-a'rada 'anhaa Wa-nasiya maa qaddamat yadaah; innaa ja'alnaa 'alaa quloobihim akinnatan any yafqahoohu Wa-feee aazaanihim waqraa; Wa-in tad'uhum ilal hudaa falany yahtadooo izan abadaa
translations.2: Waman athlamu mimman thukkira biayati rabbihi faaAArada AAanha wanasiya ma qaddamat yadahu inna jaAAalna AAala quloobihim akinnatan an yafqahoohu wafee athanihim waqran wain tadAAuhum ila alhuda falan yahtadoo ithan abadan

words.translation: And your Lord|(is) the Most Forgiving|Owner|(of) the Mercy|If|He were to seize them|for what|they have earned|surely, He (would) have hastened|for them|the punishment|But|for them|(is) an appointment|never|they will find|other than it|other than it|an escape

translations.1: Wa-Rabbukal Ghafooru zur rahmati law yu'aakhi-zuhum bimaa kasaboo la'ajala lahumul 'azaab; bal lahum maw'idul laien yajidoo min doonihee maw'ilaa
translations.2: Warabbuka alghafooru thoo alrrahmati law yuakhithuhum bima kasaboo laAAajjala lahumu alAAathaba bal lahum mawAAidun lan yajidoo min doonihi mawilan

words.translation: And these|[the] towns|We destroyed them|when|they wronged|and We made|for their destruction|an appointed time

translations.1: Wa-tilkal quraaa ahlak-nahum lammaa zulamoo Wa-ja'alnaa limahlikihim maw'idaa
translations.2: Watilka alqura ahlaknahum lamma thalamoo wajaAAalna limahlikihim mawAAidan

words.translation: And when|said|Musa|to his boy|Not|I will cease|until|I reach|the junction|(of) the two seas|or|I continue|(for) a long period

translations.1: Wa-iz qaalaa Moosaa lifataahu laaa abrahu hattaaa ablugha majma'al bahrayni aw amdiya huqubaa
translations.2: Waith qala moosa lifatahu la abrahu hatta ablugha majmaAAa albahrayni aw amdiya huquban

words.translation: But when|they reached|the junction|between them|they forgot|their fish|and it took|its way|into|the sea|slipping away

translations.1: Falammaa balaghaa majma'a bainihimaa nasiyaa hootahumaa fattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri sarabaa
translations.2: Falamma balagha majmaAAa baynihima nasiya hootahuma faittakhatha sabeelahu fee albahri saraban

words.translation: Then when|they had passed beyond|he said|to his boy|Bring us|our morning meal|Certainly|we have suffered|in|our journey|this|fatigue

translations.1: Falammaa jaawazaa qaala lifataahu aatinaa ghadaaa'anaa laqad laqeena min safarinaa haazaa nasabaa
translations.2: Falamma jawaza qala lifatahu atina ghadaana laqad laqeena min safarina hatha nasaban

words.translation: He said|Did you see|when|we retired|to|the rock|Then indeed I|[I] forgot|the fish|And not|made me forget it|except|the Shaitaan|that|I mention it|And it took|its way|into|the sea|amazingly

translations.1: Qaala ara'ayta iz awainaaa ilas sakhrati fa-innee naseetul hoota Wa-maaa ansaaneehu illash Shaitaanu an azkurah; wattakhaza sabeelahoo fil bahri 'ajabaa
translations.2: Qala araayta ith awayna ila alssakhrati fainnee naseetu alhoota wama ansaneehu illa alshshaytanu an athkurahu waittakhatha sabeelahu fee albahri AAajaban

words.translation: He said|That|(is) what|we were|seeking|So they returned|on|their footprints|retracing

translations.1: Qaala zaalika maa kunnaa nabghi; fartaddaa 'alaa aasaari-him-maa qasasaa
translations.2: Qala thalika ma kunna nabghi fairtadda AAala atharihima qasasan

words.translation: Then they found|a servant|from|Our servants|whom We had given|mercy|from|Us|and We had taught him|from|Us|a knowledge

translations.1: Fa-wajadaa 'abdam min 'ibaadinaaa aatainaahu Rahmatam min 'indinaa Wa-'allamnaahu mil ladunnaa 'ilmaa
translations.2: Fawajada AAabdan min AAibadina ataynahu rahmatan min AAindina waAAallamnahu min ladunna AAilman

words.translation: Said|to him|Musa|May|I follow you|on|that|you teach me|of what|you have been taught|(of) right guidance

translations.1: Qaala lahoo Moosaa hal attabi'uka 'alaaa an tu'allimani mimmaa 'ullimta rushdaa
translations.2: Qala lahu moosa hal attabiAAuka AAala an tuAAallimani mimma AAullimta rushdan

words.translation: He said|Indeed you|never|will be able|with me|(to have) patience

translations.1: Qaalaa innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
translations.2: Qala innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran

words.translation: And how can|you have patience|for|what|not|you encompass|of it|any knowledge

translations.1: Wa-kaifa tasbiru 'alaa maa lam tuhit bihee khubraa
translations.2: Wakayfa tasbiru AAala ma lam tuhit bihi khubran

words.translation: He said|You will find me|if|Allah wills|Allah wills|patient|and not|I will disobey|your|order

translations.1: Qaala satajiduneee in shaa 'al-laahu saabiranw Wa-laaa a'see laka amraa
translations.2: Qala satajidunee in shaa Allahu sabiran wala aAAsee laka amran

words.translation: He said|Then if|you follow me|(do) not|ask me|about|anything|until|I present|to you|of it|a mention

translations.1: Qaala fa-init taba'tanee falaa tas'alnee 'an shai'in hattaaa uhdisa laka minhu zikraa
translations.2: Qala faini ittabaAAtanee fala tasalnee AAan shayin hatta ohditha laka minhu thikran

words.translation: So they both set out|until|when|they had embarked|on|the ship|he made a hole in it|He said|Have you made a hole in it|to drown|its people|Certainly|you have done|a thing|grave

translations.1: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaa rakibaa fis safeenati kharaqahaa qaala akharaqtahaa litughriqa ahlahaa laqad ji'ta shai'an imraa
translations.2: Faintalaqa hatta itha rakiba fee alssafeenati kharaqaha qala akharaqtaha litughriqa ahlaha laqad jita shayan imran

words.translation: He said|Did not|I say|indeed you|never|will be able|with me|(to have) patience

translations.1: Qaala alam aqul innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
translations.2: Qala alam aqul innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran

words.translation: He said|(Do) not|blame me|for what|I forgot|and (do) not|be hard (upon) me|in|my affair|(raising) difficulty

translations.1: Qaala laa tu'aakhiznee bimaa naseetu Wa-laa turhiqnee min amree 'usraa
translations.2: Qala la tuakhithnee bima naseetu wala turhiqnee min amree AAusran

words.translation: Then they both set out|until|when|they met|a boy|then he killed him|He said|Have you killed|a soul|pure|for other than|a soul|Certainly|you have done|a thing|evil

translations.1: Fantalaqaa hattaa izaa laqiyaa ghulaaman faqatalahoo qaala aqatalta nafsan zakiy-yatam bighairi nafs; laqad ji'ta shai'an nukraa
translations.2: Faintalaqa hatta itha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qala aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad jita shayan nukran

words.translation: He said|Did not|I say|to you|that you|never|will be able|with me|(to have) patience

translations.1: Qaala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastatee'a ma'iya sabraa
translations.2: Qala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastateeAAa maAAiya sabran

words.translation: He said|If|I ask you|about|anything|after it|then (do) not|keep me as a companion|Verily|you have reached|from me|from me|an excuse

translations.1: Qaala in sa-altuka 'an shai'im ba'dahaa falaa tusaahibnee qad balaghta mil ladunnee 'uzraa
translations.2: Qala in saaltuka AAan shayin baAAdaha fala tusahibnee qad balaghta min ladunnee AAuthran

words.translation: So they set out|until|when|they came|(to the) people|(of) a town|they asked for food|(from) its people|but they refused|to|offer them hospitality|Then they found|in it|a wall|(that) want(ed)|to|collapse|so he set it straight|He said|If|you wished|surely you (could) have taken|for it|a payment

translations.1: Fantalaqaa hattaaa izaaa atayaaa ahla qaryatinis tat'amaaa ahlahaa fa-abaw any yudaiyifoohumaa fawajadaa feehaa jidaarany yureedu any yanqadda fa-aqaamah; qaala law shi'ta lattakhazta 'alaihi ajraa
translations.2: Faintalaqa hatta itha ataya ahla qaryatin istatAAama ahlaha faabaw an yudayyifoohuma fawajada feeha jidaran yureedu an yanqadda faaqamahu qala law shita laittakhathta AAalayhi ajran

words.translation: He said|This|(is) parting|between me|and between you|I will inform you|of (the) interpretation|(of) what|not|you were able|on it|(to have) patience

translations.1: Qaala haazaa firaaqu bainee Wa-bainik; sa-unabi-'uka bitaaweeli maa lam tastati' 'alaihi sabraa
translations.2: Qala hatha firaqu baynee wabaynika saonabbioka bitaweeli ma lam tastatiAA AAalayhi sabran

words.translation: As for|the ship|it was|of (the) poor people|working|in|the sea|So I intended|that|I cause defect (in) it|(as there) was|after them|a king|who seized|every|ship|(by) force

translations.1: Ammas safeenatu fakaanat limasaakeena ya'maloona fil bahri fa-arattu an a'eebahaa Wa-kaana waraaa'-ahum malikuien yaakhuzu kulla safeenatin ghasbaa
translations.2: Amma alssafeenatu fakanat limasakeena yaAAmaloona fee albahri faaradtu an aAAeebaha wakana waraahum malikun yakhuthu kulla safeenatin ghasban

words.translation: And as for|the boy|his parents were|his parents were|believers|and we feared|that|he would overburden them|(by) transgression|and disbelief

translations.1: Wa-aammal ghulaamu fakaana abawaahu mu'minaini fakhasheenaaa aien yurhiqa-humaa tughyaananw Wa-kufraa
translations.2: Waamma alghulamu fakana abawahu muminayni fakhasheena an yurhiqahuma tughyanan wakufran

words.translation: So we intended|that|would change for them|their Lord|a better|than him|(in) purity|and nearer|(in) affection

translations.1: Faradnaa aien yubdila-humaa Rabbuhumaa khairam minhu zakaatanw Wa-aqraba ruhmaa
translations.2: Faaradna an yubdilahuma rabbuhuma khayran minhu zakatan waaqraba ruhman

words.translation: And as for|the wall|it was|for two orphan boys|for two orphan boys|in|the town|and was|underneath it|a treasure|for them|and was|their father|righteous|So intended|your Lord|that|they reach|their maturity|and bring forth|their treasure|(as) a mercy|from|your Lord|And not|I did it|on|my (own) accord|That|(is the) interpretation|(of) what|not|you were able|on it|(to have) patience

translations.1: Wa-ammal jidaaru fakaana lighulaamaini yateemaini fil madeenati Wa-kaana tahtahoo kanzul lahumaa Wa-kaana aboohumaa saalihan fa-araada Rabbuka any yablughaaa ashuddahumaa Wa-yastakhrijaa kanzahumaa rahmatam mir Rabbik; Wa-maa fa'altuhoo 'an amree; zaalika taaweelu maa lam tasti' 'alaihi sabra
translations.2: Waamma aljidaru fakana lighulamayni yateemayni fee almadeenati wakana tahtahu kanzun lahuma wakana aboohuma salihan faarada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahuma wayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbika wama faAAaltuhu AAan amree thalika taweelu ma lam tastiAA AAalayhi sabran

words.translation: And they ask you|about|Dhul-qarnain|Dhul-qarnain|Say|I will recite|to you|about him|a remembrance

translations.1: Wa-yas'aloonaka 'an Zil Qarnaini qul sa-atloo 'alaikum minhu zikraa
translations.2: Wayasaloonaka AAan thee alqarnayni qul saatloo AAalaykum minhu thikran

words.translation: Indeed We|[We] established|[for] him|in|the earth|and We gave him|of|every|thing|a means

translations.1: Innaa makkannaa lahoo fil ardi Wa-aatainaahu min kulli shai'in sababaa
translations.2: Inna makkanna lahu fee alardi waataynahu min kulli shayin sababan

words.translation: So he followed|a course

translations.1: Fa-atba'a sababaa
translations.2: FaatbaAAa sababan

words.translation: Until|when|he reached|(the) setting place|(of) the sun|he found it|setting|in|a spring|(of) dark mud|and he found|near it|a community|We said|O Dhul-qarnain|O Dhul-qarnain|Either|[that]|you punish|or|[that]|you take|[in] them|(with) goodness

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa balagha maghribash shamsi wajadahaaa taghrubu fee 'aynin hami'a-tinw Wa-wajada 'indahaa qawmaa; qulnaa yaa-Zal Qarnaini immaaa an tu'az-ziba Wa-immaaa an tattakhiza feehim husnaa
translations.2: Hatta itha balagha maghriba alshshamsi wajadaha taghrubu fee AAaynin hamiatin wawajada AAindaha qawman qulna ya tha alqarnayni imma an tuAAaththiba waimma an tattakhitha feehim husnan

words.translation: He said|As for|(one) who|wrongs|then soon|we will punish him|Then|he will be returned|to|his Lord|and He will punish him|(with) a punishment|terrible

translations.1: Qaala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'azzibuhoo summa yuraddu ilaa Rabbihee fa-yu-'azzibuhoo azaaban nukraa
translations.2: Qala amma man thalama fasawfa nuAAaththibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihi fayuAAaththibuhu AAathaban nukran

words.translation: But as for|(one) who|believes|and does|righteous (deeds)|then for him|(is) a reward|good|And we will speak|to him|from|our command|(with) ease

translations.1: Wa-ammaa man aamana Wa-'amila saalihan falahoo jazaaa'anil husnaa Wa-sanaqoolu lahoo min amrinaa yusraa
translations.2: Waamma man amana waAAamila salihan falahu jazaan alhusna wasanaqoolu lahu min amrina yusran

words.translation: Then|he followed|(a) course

translations.1: Summa atba'a sababaa
translations.2: Thumma atbaAAa sababan

words.translation: Until|when|he reached|(the) rising place|(of) the sun|and he found it|rising|on|a community|not|We made|for them|against it|against it|any shelter

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa balagha matli'ash shamsi wajdahaa tatlu'u alaa qawmil lam naj'al lahum min doonihaa sitraa
translations.2: Hatta itha balagha matliAAa alshshamsi wajadaha tatluAAu AAala qawmin lam najAAal lahum min dooniha sitran

words.translation: Thus|And verily|We encompassed|of what|(was) with him|(of the) information

translations.1: Kazaalika Wa-qad ahatnaa bimaa ladaihi khubraa
translations.2: Kathalika waqad ahatna bima ladayhi khubran

words.translation: Then|he followed|a course

translations.1: Summa atba'a sababaa
translations.2: Thumma atbaAAa sababan

words.translation: Until|when|he reached|between|the two mountains|he found|besides them|besides them|a community|not|who would almost|understand|(his) speech

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa balagha bainas saddaini wajada min doonihimaa qawmal laa yakaa-doona yafqahoona qawlaa
translations.2: Hatta itha balagha bayna alssaddayni wajada min doonihima qawman la yakadoona yafqahoona qawlan

words.translation: They said|O Dhul-qarnain|O Dhul-qarnain|Indeed|Yajuj|and Majuj|(are) corrupters|in|the land|So may|we make|for you|an expenditure|[on]|that|you make|between us|and between them|a barrier

translations.1: Qaaloo yaa-Zal qarnaini inna Yaajooja Wa-Maajooja mufsidoona fil ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan 'alaaa an taj'ala bainanaa Wa-bainahum saddaa
translations.2: Qaloo ya tha alqarnayni inna yajooja wamajooja mufsidoona fee alardi fahal najAAalu laka kharjan AAala an tajAAala baynana wabaynahum saddan

words.translation: He said|What|has established me|[in it]|my Lord|(is) better|but assist me|with strength|I will make|between you|and between them|a barrier

translations.1: Qaala maa makkannee feehi Rabbee khairun fa-a'eenoonee biquwwatin aj'al bainakum Wa-bainahum radmaa
translations.2: Qala ma makkannee feehi rabbee khayrun faaAAeenoonee biquwwatin ajAAal baynakum wabaynahum radman

words.translation: Bring me|sheets|(of) iron|until|when|he (had) leveled|between|the two cliffs|he said|Blow|until|when|he made it|fire|he said|Bring me|I pour|over it|molten copper

translations.1: Aatoonee zubaral hadeed, hattaaa izaa saawaa bainas sadafaini qaalan fukhoo hattaaa izaa ja'alahoo naaran qaala aatooneee ufrigh 'alaihi qitraa
translations.2: Atoonee zubara alhadeedi hatta itha sawa bayna alsadafayni qala onfukhoo hatta itha jaAAalahu naran qala atoonee ofrigh AAalayhi qitran

words.translation: So not|they were able|to|scale it|and not|they were able|in it|(to do) any penetration

translations.1: Famas taa'ooo aien yazharoohu Wa-mas tataa'oo lahoo naqbaa
translations.2: Fama istaAAoo an yathharoohu wama istataAAoo lahu naqban

words.translation: He said|This|(is) a mercy|from|my Lord|But when|comes|(the) Promise|(of) my Lord|He will make it|level|And is|(the) Promise|(of) my Lord|true

translations.1: Qaala haaza rahmatum mir Rabbee fa-izaa jaaa'a wa'du Rabbee ja'alahoo dakkaaa'a; Wa-kaana; Wa-du Rabbee haqqaa
translations.2: Qala hatha rahmatun min rabbee faitha jaa waAAdu rabbee jaAAalahu dakkaa wakana waAAdu rabbee haqqan

words.translation: And We (will) leave|some of them|(on) that Day|to surge|over|others|and (will be) blown|in|the trumpet|then We (will) gather them|all together

translations.1: Wa-taraknaa ba'dahum Yawma'izien yamooju fee ba'dinw Wa-nufikha fis Soori fajama'naahum jam'aa
translations.2: Watarakna baAAdahum yawmaithin yamooju fee baAAdin wanufikha fee alssoori fajamaAAnahum jamAAan

words.translation: And We (will) present|Hell|(on) that Day|to the disbelievers|(on) display

translations.1: Wa-'aradnaa jahannama Yawma'izil lilkaafireena 'ardaa
translations.2: WaAAaradna jahannama yawmaithin lilkafireena AAardan

words.translation: Those|had been|their eyes|within|a cover|from|My remembrance|and were|not|able|(to) hear

translations.1: Allazeena kaanat a'yunuhum fee ghitaaa'in 'an zikree Wa-kaanoo la yastatee'oona sam'aa
translations.2: Allatheena kanat aAAyunuhum fee ghitain AAan thikree wakanoo la yastateeAAoona samAAan

words.translation: Do then think|those who|disbelieve|that|they (can) take|My servants|besides Me|besides Me|(as) protectors|Indeed, We|We have prepared|Hell|for the disbelievers|(as) a lodging

translations.1: Afahasibal lazeena kafarooo aien yattakhizoo 'ibaadee min dooneee awliyaaa'; innaaa a'tadnaa jahannama lil-kaafireena nuzulaa
translations.2: Afahasiba allatheena kafaroo an yattakhithoo AAibadee min doonee awliyaa inna aAAtadna jahannama lilkafireena nuzulan

words.translation: Say|Shall|We inform you|of the greatest losers|(as to their) deeds

translations.1: Qul hal nunabbi'ukum bilakhsareena a'maalaa
translations.2: Qul hal nunabbiokum bialakhsareena aAAmalan

words.translation: Those|is lost|their effort|in|the life|(of) the world|while they|think|that they|(were) acquiring good|(in) work

translations.1: Allazeena dalla sa'yuhum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-hum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sun'aa
translations.2: Allatheena dalla saAAyuhum fee alhayati alddunya wahum yahsaboona annahum yuhsinoona sunAAan

words.translation: Those|(are) the ones who|disbelieve|in the Verses|(of) their Lord|and the meeting (with) Him|So (are) vain|their deeds|so not|We will assign|for them|(on) the Day|(of) the Resurrection|any weight

translations.1: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena kafaroo bi-aayaati Rabbihim Wa-liqaaa'ihee fahabitat a'maaluhum falaa nuqeemu lahum Yawmal Qiyaamati waznaa
translations.2: Olaika allatheena kafaroo biayati rabbihim waliqaihi fahabitat aAAmaluhum fala nuqeemu lahum yawma alqiyamati waznan

words.translation: That|(is) their recompense|Hell|because|they disbelieved|and took|My Verses|and My Messengers|(in) ridicule

translations.1: Zaalika jazaaa'uhum jahannamu bimaa kafaroo wattakhazooo Aayaatee Wa-Rusulee huzuwaa
translations.2: Thalika jazaohum jahannamu bima kafaroo waittakhathoo ayatee warusulee huzuwan

words.translation: Indeed|those who|believed|and did|righteous deeds|for them will be|for them will be|Gardens|(of) the Paradise|(as) a lodging

translations.1: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati kaanat lahum Jannaatul Firdawsi nuzulaa
translations.2: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati kanat lahum jannatu alfirdawsi nuzulan

words.translation: Abiding forever|in it|Not|they will desire|from it|any transfer

translations.1: Khaalideena feeha la yabghoona 'anhaa hiwalaa
translations.2: Khalideena feeha la yabghoona AAanha hiwalan

words.translation: Say|If|were|the sea|ink|for (the) Words|(of) my Lord|surely (would be) exhausted|the sea|before|[that]|(were) exhausted|(the) Words|(of) my Lord|even if|We brought|(the) like (of) it|(as) a supplement

translations.1: Qul law kaanal bahru midaadal li-kalimaati Rabbee lanafidal bahru qabla an tanfada Kalimaatu Rabbee Wa-law ji'naa bimislihee madadaa
translations.2: Qul law kana albahru midadan likalimati rabbee lanafida albahru qabla an tanfada kalimatu rabbee walaw jina bimithlihi madadan

words.translation: Say|Only|I|(am) a man|like you|Has been revealed|to me|that|your God|(is) God|One|So whoever|is|hoping|(for the) meeting|(with) his Lord|let him do|deeds|righteous|and not|associate|in (the) worship|(of) his Lord|anyone

translations.1: Qul innamaaa ana basharum mislukum yoohaaa ilaiya annamaa ilaahukum Ilaahunw Waahid; faman kaana yarjoo liqaaa'a Rabbihee falya'mal 'amalan saalihanw Wa-laa yushrik bi'ibaadati Rabbiheee ahadaa
translations.2: Qul innama ana basharun mithlukum yooha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun faman kana yarjoo liqaa rabbihi falyaAAmal AAamalan salihan wala yushrik biAAibadati rabbihi ahadan
